official_title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to clarify the authority of the State of New York to regulate pilotage of vessels on the Hudson River upstream of Yonkers, New York.

summary.text: Allows the State of New York to establish any requirement applicable to the pilotage of vessels on the Hudson River that is more stringent than Federal law.

titles.title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to clarify the authority of the State of New York to regulate pilotage of vessels on the Hudson River upstream of Yonkers, New York.
